sub_title: Lecturer at the University of Groningen
summary:
Creative and resourceful researcher with a decade of experience in molecular microbiology. I have a broad knowledge of classic and novel molecular cloning techniques. I have worked with the CRISPR/Cas9 cloning system in different organisms (prokaryotes and eukaryotes).
I am also highly skilled in food biotechnology and probiotics, protein purification and bioinformatics (genome comparative analysis).
I work in an interdisciplinary and international environment, and I manage several projects at the same time. In my daily work I usually teach and guide undergraduate, overgraduate and PhD students.
